pl.description:
Elevate Your YouTube Experience with FocusTube â€“ The Ultimate Productivity & Zen Mode Extension
Transform YouTube into a focused, distraction-free, and dopamine-free space. FocusTube empowers you to hide YouTube Shorts, block suggestions, and create your own Zen mode for mindful, productive video browsing.

ğŸŒŸ Key Features & Whatâ€™s New

ğŸ¥ Hide YouTube Shorts
Block YouTube Shorts with a single click. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and reclaim your timeâ€”perfect for users seeking a more intentional, less addictive YouTube experience.

ğŸ” Hide YouTube Suggestions
Remove YouTube recommendations and related videos. Stay in control, avoid rabbit holes, and keep your attention on what truly matters.

ğŸ’¬ Hide YouTube Comments
Eliminate distractions and negativity by hiding the comments section. Enjoy a cleaner, more peaceful interfaceâ€”ideal for a Zen YouTube mode.

ğŸ™ˆ Hide Blacklisted YouTube Channels
Personalize your feed by blocking unwanted channels. Build your own YouTube blacklist and see only the content that aligns with your goals.

â›” Hide Blacklisted Words in Titles
Filter out videos by keywords. Block clickbait, spoilers, or any content that doesnâ€™t fit your productivity or wellness journey.

ğŸš€ NEW: Hide Home Page Content
Activate Zen mode by hiding the entire YouTube homepage feed. Remove all distractions and keep only the search barâ€”perfect for deep work and mindful browsing.

ğŸš« NEW: Stop Autoplay After Videos End
Disable YouTubeâ€™s autoplay to prevent binge-watching. Take back control and make conscious choices about what you watch next.

ğŸ§­ NEW: Hide YouTube Sidebar (Guide)
Hide the YouTube sidebar/guide for a minimalist, focused interface. Achieve a true Zen YouTube experience.

âœ¨ Dopamine Detox & Mindful Browsing
FocusTube is designed for productivity, digital wellness, and dopamine detox. Create a YouTube environment that supports your focus, learning, and peace of mind.

Why Choose FocusTube?
ğŸ¯ Productivity Booster: Block distractions, avoid mindless scrolling, and use YouTube as a tool for learning and growth.
ğŸ§˜ Zen Mode: Enjoy a minimalist, calm, and clutter-free YouTubeâ€”perfect for meditation, study, or work.
ğŸ”§ Fully Customizable: Hide Shorts, comments, suggestions, or anything you want. Build your own distraction-free YouTube.
ğŸš€ Easy to Use: Simple toggles and intuitive controlsâ€”no technical skills required.

How to Use FocusTube

Install FocusTube from the Chrome Web Store.
Enable the features you want: hide Shorts, block suggestions, activate Zen mode, and more.
Blacklist channels or keywords to filter your feed.
Enjoy a focused, productive, and dopamine-free YouTube experience!

Install FocusTube now and unlock the most productive, peaceful, and personalized YouTube ever!
